title: HPI 24 - No Two Ways About It - Sankara and Advaita Vedanta
itunes:title: HPI 24 - No Two Ways About It - Sankara and Advaita Vedanta
description: Śaṅkara and his “non-dual” (Advaita) Vedānta, which teaches that only brahman is real, and the world of experience and individual self are mere illusion.
content:encoded: Śaṅkara and his “non-dual” (Advaita) Vedānta, which teaches that only brahman is real, and the world of experience and individual self are mere illusion.
